title: Kevin Begois
text:
Kevin Begois (born 13 May 1982) is a Belgian former <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who played as a <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>. He is currently working as a goalkeeper coach for the youth sector of <a href="PSV%20Eindhoven">PSV Eindhoven</a>.
Coaching career.
After retiring at the end of the 2018-19, Begois was hired as a goalkeeper coach for the youth sector of <a href="PSV%20Eindhoven">PSV Eindhoven</a>.
Honours.
Club.
VVV-Venlo
PEC Zwolle
